lines.content: - Recommended background and chat bubble colors for better contrast.
- Proposed rounded corners and shadow effects for a modern look.
- Recommended padding and spacing adjustments for cleaner alignment.
- Added shadows to chat bubble for better visual effects.
- Gave tips on displaying chatbot responses.
- Selected final color scheme and fonts based on my preference.
- Adjusted spacing, layout, and hover effects manually.
- Integrated AI suggestions with my own code, tested them, and fixed minor bugs.

Love typing and getting things done?
Chatterbox is your new command-line productivity companion!
Chatterbox helps you stay organised through natural, simple to remember and intuitive commands!
Adds a todo task to the task list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 tasks in the list.
Adds a deadline task to the task list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
Adds an event task to the task list with a start and end date/time.
Format: event DESCRIPTION /from dd/mm/yy HhMm /to dd/mm/yy HhMm
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
Mark a task as complete based on index in task list.
Mark a task as incomplete based on index in task list.
Deletes a task from the task list by index.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
